message: John: also, I would suggest you and I are both much closer to the "reads often" end of society's spectrum than most; our perception will be biased

John: I don't visit coffee shops that aren't bookstores often, but my impression around here (Indy) has always been very few people reading. even in bookstores with coffee shops, the shop has a very small corner of the store
(that twitter url expanding is annoying above, too; I'm still in the experimental stage with convore)
